askQuestions.helpNegotiate: These questions help you understand the intent and may reveal room for negotiation.

termination.q1: "What are the specific conditions under which either party can terminate?"
termination.q2: "Is there a notice period required, and can it be negotiated?"
termination.q3: "What happens to any prepaid fees if the contract is terminated early?"

liability.q1: "Can you cap the liability to a specific dollar amount?"
liability.q2: "What insurance coverage do you have for these liabilities?"
liability.q3: "Are there any exclusions to this liability clause?"

autoRenew.q1: "Can we change this to require active opt-in for renewal?"
autoRenew.q2: "What is the deadline to cancel before auto-renewal?"
autoRenew.q3: "Will you notify me before the renewal date?"

payment.q1: "Are there any hidden fees or additional charges not listed?"
payment.q2: "What happens if I miss a payment deadline?"
payment.q3: "Can the pricing change during the contract term?"

data.q1: "How will my data be stored and protected?"
data.q3: "What happens to my data if I terminate the agreement?"

nonCompete.q1: "What is the geographic scope of this restriction?"
nonCompete.q2: "How long does this restriction last after the contract ends?"

generic.q1: "Can you explain why '{title}' is structured this way?"
generic.q2: "Is there flexibility to modify this specific term?"
generic.q3: "What would happen if we removed or changed this clause?"

modifications.rememberNegotiable: Remember: Everything is negotiable until signed.
modifications.severityWarning: Given the severity, strongly consider addressing this before signing.

termination.m1: Request a mutual termination clause with equal notice periods for both parties
termination.m2: Add a 'cure period' allowing time to fix issues before termination
termination.m3: Include prorated refund terms for early termination

liability.m1: Cap liability to the total contract value or a specific amount
liability.m3: Require the other party to maintain adequate insurance

autoRenew.m1: Change to opt-in renewal requiring written consent
autoRenew.m2: Extend the cancellation notice period to 60 or 90 days
autoRenew.m3: Add a requirement for renewal reminder notifications

payment.m1: Lock in pricing for the full contract term
payment.m2: Add a grace period for late payments before penalties apply
payment.m3: Cap any price increases to a fixed percentage

data.m1: Add specific data deletion requirements upon termination
data.m2: Require notification within 24-48 hours of any data breach
data.m3: Limit data usage to only what's necessary for the service

nonCompete.m1: Narrow the geographic scope to a specific region
nonCompete.m2: Reduce the duration of the restriction
nonCompete.m3: Add specific carve-outs for your core business activities

generic.m1: Request clearer language defining the scope of "{title}"
generic.m2: Add specific limits or boundaries to reduce your exposure
